Class BitmapChartObject

Namespace
FinScript.Rendering.ChartObjects
Assembly
FinScript.Core.dll

Bitmap chart object with relative screen coordinates, defined in range [0..1]

[PublicAPI]
public class BitmapChartObject : ChartObject, IScriptUnit, INameDescriptionProvider, INameProvider, IPropertyDisplayInfoProvider, ICloneable, IScriptEnvironmentAssigner, IChartElement, IChartRenderable, IZOrderAssigner, IChartHitTestable, IOriginProvider, IOneRelativePointProvider

Width 

public int Width { get; }

Property Value

int

X

Horizontal position of chart element in ranges [0..1] 0 means left edge of the chart, 1 means right edge, 0.5 - the horizontal center

public double X { get; set; }

Property Value

double

Y

Vertical position of chart element in ranges [0..1] 0 means top edge of the chart, 1 means bottom edge, 0.5 - the vertical center

public double Y { get; set; }

Property Value

double

If mouse cursor hits the shape of chart element, this method returns result, otherwise null

HitTest(double)

If vertical line positioned in xCoordinate crosses the shape of chart element, this method returns collection with all intersections
